diff.author: Dieterich Lawson
diff.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS messaging_addresses ( `address_id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `uuid` char(38) NOT NULL, `address` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `password` varchar(255) default '', `person` int(11) NOT NULL default 0, `preferred` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `findable` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `protocol_id` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `creator` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `date_created` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `changed_by` int(11) default NULL, `date_changed` datetime default NULL, `voided` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `voided_by` int(11) default NULL, `date_voided` datetime default NULL, `void_reason` varchar(255) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (address_id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS messaging_messages ( `message_id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `uuid` char(38) NOT NULL, `content` varchar(600) default '', `protocol_id` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `origin` varchar(255) default '', `destination` varchar(255) default '', `sender` int(11) default NULL, `recipient` int(11) default NULL, `date` datetime default NULL, `send_attempts` int(3) default 0, `status` int(4) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`message_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

diff.author: Dieterich Lawson
diff.description: Makes these changes to the database structure: - make Message.content a MySQL TEXT type (holds ~64 kb of text) - add Message.in_reply_to field - reference to the message that this message is in reply to. - add Message.subject (plain text, 256 characters) - remove "sender", "recipient", "origin", and "destination" of MessagingAddress, replacing them with MessagingAddresses. - make Message.recipients a list of MessagingAddresses (one to many relationship with associative table/join table) - rename protocol_id to protocol_class - remove password field from MessagingAddress
